    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    AdminController
    REST Controller provides administrative endpoints for managing users and cards, including card creation, activation/blocking, transaction retrieval, and user limit settings.
    AESUtil
    Utility class for encryption and decryption using AES in GCM mode with NoPadding.
    AuthController
    REST controller responsible for user authentication.
    BlockCardRequest
     
    BlockCardRequest.Status
     
    BlockCardRequestRepository
     
    BlockCardRequestService
    Service responsible for handling operations related to card block requests.
    Card
     
    CardDto
     
    CardManagementSystemApplication
     
    CardRepository
     
    CardService
    Service class for managing bank cards.
    JwtAuthenticationFilter
    JWT Authentication filter that intercepts HTTP requests and performs authentication based on a JWT token.
    JwtAuthenticationResponse
     
    JwtTokenProvider
    Service responsible for generating, validating, and extracting information from JSON Web Tokens (JWT).
    LoginRequest
     
    SecurityConfig
     
    Transaction
     
    TransactionDto
     
    TransactionRepository
     
    TransactionService
    Service class responsible for handling transactions between cards.
    User
     
    User.Role
     
    UserController
    REST controller for handling user-related operations such as retrieving cards, submitting block requests, executing transactions, and withdrawing funds.
    UserDetailsServiceImpl
    Service implementation of UserDetailsService used by Spring Security to retrieve user details during the authentication process.
    UserDto
     
    UserRepository
     
    UserService
    Service class for managing user-related operations such as retrieving, creating, updating limits, and deleting users.
